function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced ventilation rates for single-sided ventilation","Impact":"Increased risk of infection due to reduced ventilation","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates by optimizing window opening or using mechanical ventilation systems","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, smart ventilation control systems","People":"Building occupants, public","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Infection likelihood exceeding 1% with exposure time exceeding 2 hours","Impact":"Higher risk of infection due to prolonged exposure time","Mitigation":"Limit exposure time, increase ventilation rates, and encourage mask-wearing","Technologies":"Smart ventilation control systems, real-time air quality monitors","People":"Building occupants, public","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Increased power consumption with air conditioner operated at 15% window opening ratio","Impact":"Higher energy consumption and associated costs","Mitigation":"Optimize window opening ratio, use energy-efficient ventilation systems","Technologies":"Energy-efficient ventilation systems, smart HVAC controls","People":"Building occupants, facility management","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
